CustomField.description: Prev. formula: licensePlateCost__c + Final_tax_after_deduction__c + (Sixt_steel_purchase_price__c + Delivery_cost__c + handlingCost__c) * 1.25
CustomField.inlineHelpText: (Sixt steel purchase price + Delivery cost + Handling Cost + Price Aftermarket accessories excl VAT) * 1.25 + Final tax after deduction + License Plate Cost
CustomField.label: Tax Base
